events.text: Per Lindberg and Kodeworks AS founded Sunlit Sea AS.
Kodeworks gives subordinated loan for startup period, 550 KNOK.
Innovation Norway awards 650 KNOK grant for commercialization.
Initial spread sale of shares, 2 MNOK invested by external investors at 50 MNOK valuation.
Patent applications on 2 central aspects of Sunlit Sea’s solution delivered to UK patent office.
Prototype 1. 4x4 float matrix. Basic sensors and power production.
Ceiia delivers results substantiating the solution’s structural design. Stadt Towing Tank delivers results substantiating the solution’s hydrodynamic properties.
Letter of intent on building a 1MWp pilot plant at Lierstranda mid 2021.
Sunlit Sea Pakistan founded.
Norwegian Research Council awards 14.6 MNOK in grant.
Module level power electronics completed.
Detailed production plans completed and visualized in 3D video material.
Completed test tool for sensors and data communication.
Supply chain: deal with a producer on favorable prices of marine-grade solar panels.
Innovation Norway awards 8.3 MNOK in grants throughout the year. Total capital raised: 29 MNOK. Total expenses: ~6 MNOK.
Share sales, ~1.5 MNOK.
Prototype 2. 8 kWp. Floats with module level power electronics and sensorics.
Latest verified evaluation: 300 MNOK.
Full-time hydrodynamics expert.
Prototype 3. 3 kWp. Single float with load cells, moist sensors and digital twin.
8.4 MNOK grant for environment tech from Innovation Norway.
Share sales ~12.2 MNOK throughout the year.
R&D production line established.
Press tool finished. Integration into manufacturing pipeline.
Full-time industrial expert.
MVP of web-based sales tool.
Hinges prototyped and tested.
Production line version 1 (manual) established.
Prototype 4. First form-pressed float, 2x2 m2. Additive welding.
Water-ingress results from our research partner.
Welding procedure established.
Prototype 5. Exposed location.
